name: SimplyRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Simply Radio”
”Alexa, open Simply Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simply radio
des: Simply Electro Radio: Embark on an endless musical odyssey with SimplyRadio.com Live @ Scan’s House, your constant source of beats that knows no bounds, streaming live 24/7, 365 days a year, and hosted by DJ Scan. Dive into an eclectic playlist that transcends genres, spanning almost every musical realm, whether it’s the energy of a live session or the recorded magic of the past 30 years. From sunrise to late-night vibes, our station is a timeless journey, painting every moment with vibrant melodies. Whether it’s a live mix or a recording, the music is authentic and alive. Tune in, let go, and let the music be your eternal soundtrack. With SimplyRadio.com Live @ Scan’s House and DJ Scan at the helm, the celebration never ends, and the rhythm is forever alive.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
